law.catch_line: Issuance of certificate of authority -- Notification of deficiencies in application and of reasons for denial.

text.section: If the certificate of authority is denied, the commissioner shall notify the applicant and shall specify the reasons for denial in the notice. The limited health service organization shall have sixty (60) days from the date of receipt of the notice to request a hearing before the commissioner pursuant to KRS 304.2-310.
Each certificate of authority issued to a limited health service organization shall designate the type of services the limited health service organization is authorized to provide.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1518, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2002.
